question: What is the objective of Gangadhar Meher Sikhya Manakbrudhi Yojana of Odisha?
option1: To provide free school bag to the students
option2: To provide free text book and uniform to the student
option3: To provide bicycle to the student
explanation: Gangadhar Meher is one of the famous poets of Odisha. Gangadhar Meher Sikhya Manakbrudhi Yojana of Odisha aims at providing education accessories like Schoolbags (Class I to V), uniforms (Class I to VIII), books (Class I to VIII) and bicycles (For class IX) to the students of Government and fully aided schools. The government allocated an amount of 231 crores in this 2020-21 budget.
